action.content: Turn 0

You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Write your plan for your next actions on the line below your action, starting with "Next actions:".
For example:
> open cupboard
Next actions: take orange, eat orange

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the potted plant on the table, the book in the refrigerator and the mop in the wardrobe.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a hallway and a pantry here.

> open cupboard
Next actions: take book, put book in refrigerator
Turn 1
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a plate.

> take plate
Next actions: put plate back, take book
Turn 2
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a plate.

> go to pantry
Next actions: look for items, take items
Turn 3
You are in a pantry now. There are a refrigerator and a freezer. The refrigerator is closed. The freezer is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.

> open refrigerator
Next actions: put plate in refrigerator, take book
Turn 4
The refrigerator is now open. In the refrigerator there are a peach, a orange, a banana, a apple and a sandwich.

> take book
Next actions: put book in refrigerator, go to kitchen
Turn 5
You can't see a book here.

> go to kitchen
Next actions: go to hallway, look for book
Turn 6
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a hallway and a pantry here.

> go to hallway
Next actions: explore hallway, look for book
Turn 7
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room and a broom closet here.

> take potted plant
Next actions: go to kitchen, put potted plant on counter
Turn 8
You take the potted plant. In your inventory you have a plate and a potted plant.

> go to kitchen
Next actions: put potted plant on counter, go to living room
Turn 9
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a hallway and a pantry here.

> put potted plant on counter
Next actions: go to living room, look for book
Turn 10
You put the potted plant on the counter.

> go to living room
Next actions: look for book, take book
Turn 11
You can't go to a living room from here.

> go to hallway
Next actions: go to living room, look for book
Turn 12
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room and a broom closet here.

> go to living room
Next actions: look for book, take book
Turn 13
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a couch, a chair and a shelf. There are passages to a bedroom and a hallway here.

> examine shelf
Next actions: take book, go to hallway
Turn 14
There is nothing on the shelf.

> go to hallway
Next actions: go to broom closet, look for mop
Turn 15
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room and a broom closet here.

> go to broom closet
Next actions: take mop, go to living room
Turn 16
You are in a broom closet now. There are a mop and a broom. The mop is on the floor. The broom is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.

> take mop
Next actions: go to hallway, go to living room
Turn 17
You take the mop. In your inventory you have a plate and a mop.

> go to hallway
Next actions: go to living room, put mop in wardrobe
Turn 18
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room and a broom closet here.

> go to living room
Next actions: go to bedroom, look for wardrobe
Turn 19
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a couch, a chair and a shelf. There are passages to a bedroom and a hallway here.

> go to bedroom
Next actions: look for wardrobe, put mop in wardrobe
Turn 20
You are in a bedroom now. There are a wardrobe, a bed and a table. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a living room here.

> open wardrobe
Next actions: put mop in wardrobe, look for book
Turn 21
The wardrobe is now open. In the wardrobe there are a book and a pillow.

> take book
Next actions: put mop in wardrobe, go to kitchen
Turn 22
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.

> put plate in wardrobe
Next actions: take book, put mop in wardrobe
Turn 23
You put the plate in the wardrobe.

> take book
Next actions: put mop in wardrobe, put book in refrigerator
Turn 24
You take the book. In your inventory you have a book and a mop.

> put mop in wardrobe
Next actions: go to kitchen, put book in refrigerator
Turn 25
You put the mop in the wardrobe.

> go to kitchen
Next actions: put book in refrigerator, go to pantry
Turn 26
You can't go to a kitchen from here.

> go to living room
Next actions: go to hallway, go to kitchen
Turn 27
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a couch, a chair and a shelf. There are passages to a bedroom and a hallway here.

> go to hallway
Next actions: go to kitchen, put book in refrigerator
Turn 28
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room and a broom closet here.

> go to kitchen
Next actions: put book in refrigerator, done
Turn 29
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard, a potted plant and a counter. The cupboard is open. The potted plant is on the counter. There are passages to a hallway and a pantry here.

> go to pantry
Next actions: put book in refrigerator, done
Turn 30

You are in a pantry now. There are a peach, a banana, a apple, a refrigerator, a orange, a freezer and a sandwich. The peach is in the refrigerator. The banana is in the refrigerator. The apple is in the refrigerator. The refrigerator is open. The orange is in the refrigerator. The freezer is closed. The sandwich is in the refrigerator. There is a passage to a kitchen here.

> put book in refrigerator
Next actions: done
Turn 31
You put the book in the refrigerator.
> done
done
